chinese: 隰桑有阿、其葉有難。既見君子、其樂如何。
english: In the low, wet grounds, the mulberry trees are beautiful,And their leaves are luxuriant.When I see the princely men,How great is the pleasure!

chinese: 隰桑有阿、其葉有沃。既見君子、云何不樂。
english: In the low, wet grounds, the mulberry trees are beautiful,And their leaves are glossy.When I see the princely men,How can I be other than glad?

chinese: 隰桑有阿、其葉有幽。既見君子、德音孔膠。
english: In the low, wet grounds, the mulberry trees are beautiful,And their leaves are dark.When I see the princely men,Their virtuous fame draws them close [to my heart].

chinese: 心乎愛矣、遐不謂矣。中心藏之、何日忘之。
english: In my heart I love them,And why should I not say so?In the core of my heart I keep them,And never will forget them.
